comments.en: Cartridge containing toner and imaging drum

Does not understand any standard language. Works with a modified version of the "foo2zjs" driver. Foomatic data and PPD files are in the driver package. It is planned to merge this driver version with the upstream "foo2zjs".

The printer is similar to the LaserJet 1000 and 1005.

The firmware of the printer must be uploaded after turning it on. The modified "foo2zjs" driver package contains a script to do the upload automatically.
